section.heading: Exemptions—Eligible server equipment—Eligible power infrastructure—Computer data centers. (Expires July 1, 2053.)

content.p: A qualifying business or a qualifying tenant is not eligible for the exemption under this section unless the department issued an exemption certificate to the qualifying business or a qualifying tenant for the exemption provided in RCW 82.08.986 .
The definitions and requirements in RCW 82.08.986 apply to this section.
of this section does not apply to the use of eligible server equipment and eligible power infrastructure, and the labor and services provided in subsection
of this section, if first used by qualifying businesses or qualifying tenants on or after July 1, 2048.

This section expires July 1, 2053.
